description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. He's a gamer, a bootlegger, a photographer and a connoisseur of the Ladies!  Purchase “Trailer Park King Episode 2” now to continue the adventure and get a glimpse of "The King's" invisible stamp that says “I dated the Greeter”!
